episodes.title: Short Technical Discussion
episodes.transcript: Hello, today we're discussing artificial intelligence and machine learning. These technologies are transforming how we process data and make decisions.

episodes.title: Multi-Speaker Conversation
episodes.transcript: Speaker 1: Welcome to our podcast. Speaker 2: Thank you for having me. Speaker 1: Let's discuss technology trends. Speaker 2: I think AI is the most important trend right now.
